choices: On Jennifer’s Bed While She Is Sleeping
1.content:
You are Jack, a 13 year old orphan who lives in a careless orphanage.

Jack is a massive fan of the Actress/Singer Jennifer Lopez (https://media.allure.com/photos/5de42f48...) You love everything about her from her Brown Skin, Her Full Lips, Her Latino New York Accent, Her Sculptured Body, Her Huge Ass And Most Of All Her FEET (you have a foot fetish)

You wish you can leave this place and be with Jennifer Lopez. One night you are actually desperate enough to wish on a star and wish that you can be with her and you don’t care how (even though you should).

The next morning you wake up in a strange envoirmemt....
1.title: Getting Shrunk

info.brief_description: Jack has shrunk and has to survive the giantess Jennifer Lopez
info.description:
Jack is mysteriously shrunk to 1cm tall and is in the unaware presence of Jennifer Lopez

Be Free To Write On This Story, But Please Follow Theses Rules If You Can

RULES:
DON’T KILL JACK OFF (Don’t End The Story)

Keep It Unaware (Meaning He Never Gets Discovered As A Shrunken Man/If Found He Is A Toy Or A Bug)

Keep It Focused On A Jennifer Lopez (No Solo Men/Maybe Sex)

Anything Sexual Goes

Try To Describe Jennifer Lopez/Use Image Links
